1 down from the top of the them down on a table use the 10 long tassel several times tightly strand to tie the strands together in the  thread that end into the yarn tapestry needle middle as shown below as shown below  insert the tapestry needle from the top down  pull through and remove the tapestry needle towards the ends under the tight wraps as shown below  use scissors to trim the tassel ends to make them even use the strand at the top of the tassel to sew tassel securely to the tip of the hat weave in all loose ends steam press lightly do not put full weight of iron on hat or stitches will get flattened too much if needed to flatten seam and fold of brim a bit y page 5 of 6 swb-c00058 y  copyright sweaterbabe com all rights reserved worldwide sweaterbabe com has made every effort to be accurate and complete with our patterns they are provided strictly as is we are not responsible for differences between knitters knitting mistakes or any typographical errors our patterns are authorized for home knitting use only and are not to be knit for resale sweaterbabe com patterns may not be photocopied or distributed in any hardcopy or electronic form without the express written consent of sweaterbabe com join the sweaterbabe com knitting club for new patterns each month giveaways & expert advice your #1 website for free pattern downloads great knitting and crochet patterns a big searchable yarn shop directory and much more join the sweaterbabe com knitting club for just $7 99/month * download great new knitting patterns for free every month * win cool product giveaways visit www sweaterbabeclub com * meet other fun knitters like you for more info * access your exclusive members-only web site 24/7 you ll always have something new and exciting to knit * get personal expert advice from me on your knitting questions sweaterbabe is your knitting coach *** win a free pattern of your choosing *** submit a photo of any
